Section.Catchline: Planning, promoting, and supervising state building projects.

Subsection.Text: The Department of Management Services shall be responsible for promoting any state building project financed as provided by law in any community where a state building is needed.

Whenever the Division of Bond Finance and the Board of Administration shall find a building project financially feasible, all state agencies, commissions, bureaus, or branch offices of any department occupying rented office space in the area, shall occupy space in the state buildings to the extent that space is available.

Any state agency required to occupy space by the Department of Management Services may contract for such space and pledge such rentals as are provided and appropriated by the Legislature for the purpose of financing the retirement of revenue certificates for the lifetime of any issue.
